title: Unable to install/update game. Help?
body: Just popped open a brand new Sony laptop with a AMD A8 Quad core and figured it should run League without a problem. Ran the install wizard and now the client is stuck at 0% (updating interface).  I have downloaded/played/updated League for years off this same Wifi. Any helpful suggestions are welcome.

replies.body:
I have a similar issue: Since the hotfix, I can log in etc. but the patching for the hotfix stays at 0%, and after a while says "Error 004" and crashes. 

I tried comming back to the legacy launcher but it refuses to launch ever since.

I understand if there is a issue with people trying to download the game possibly caused by a recent patch. I would just like to know if such a problem is known to exist so I an quit trying to download it for tonight. But if there's something i'm doing wrong i'd like to know so I can eventually play the game. Any help is appreciated

I don't know of any issues preventing players from patching or downloading the game. Getting stuck at 0% during patching usually indicates that League doesn't have the right privileges in order to scan your League directory before it starts grabbing files (after 32%). I'd recommend you [**configure your permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for League in case this was the exact cause.

Let me know if this helped.
I also understand the common answer to this is 'It takes a long time to download'. It has been 8 hours and I am still at 0% so i'd assume there's a problem
